title: Chroma BM25 Embedding Function Schema
description: Schema for the Chroma BM25 sparse embedding function configuration

k.description: BM25 saturation parameter controlling term frequency scaling

avg_doc_length.description: Average document length in tokens used for normalization

token_max_length.description: Maximum token length allowed before filtering

stopwords.description: Optional custom stopword list (in lowercase) to override the defaults
